issue.title: [Release] Build of ubuntu-python is failing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12971](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12971). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

This happens when running 

dev/release/post-09-docs.sh 4.0.1

after applying the patch in ARROW-12954.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12971?focusedCommentId=17358221) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
It seems that this is caused by network error. (I tried this but I didn't get the error.)
Could you try this again?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12971?focusedCommentId=17358340) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
I consistently get it (10/10).

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12971?focusedCommentId=17358349) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
`[~kszucs]` Could you try this on your environment?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12971?focusedCommentId=17359558) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
I found the reason: https://stackoverflow.com/q/59139453/931303 . It is specific to docker and corrupted state. I will mark this as won't fix since there is nothing we can do in our end.
